trans-unit.source: Represents a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 表示的事务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Transactions> namespace provides both an explicit programming model based on the Transaction class, as well as an implicit programming model using the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope> class, in which transactions are automatically managed by the infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Transactions>命名空间提供这两个显式编程模型基于事务类，以及隐式编程模型使用<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope>类，在其中事务自动管理基础结构。</xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope> </xref:System.Transactions>

trans-unit.source: It is highly recommended that you use the easier implicit model for development.
trans-unit.target: 强烈建议你将用于开发变得更容易隐式的模型。

trans-unit.source: To get started, please see the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/1ddba95e-7587-48b2-8838-708c275e7199) topic.
trans-unit.target: 若要开始，请参阅[实现隐式事务使用事务范围](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/1ddba95e-7587-48b2-8838-708c275e7199)主题。

trans-unit.source: For more information on writing a transactional application, see [Writing A Transactional Application](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4a7cc4d1-0891-4605-941f-a933b9ce5bc8).
trans-unit.target: 编写事务应用程序的详细信息，请参阅[编写一个事务应用程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4a7cc4d1-0891-4605-941f-a933b9ce5bc8)。

trans-unit.source: The Transaction class contains methods used by developers implementing resource managers for enlistment.
trans-unit.target: 事务类包含由开发人员实现登记的资源管理器使用的方法。

trans-unit.source: It also provides functionalities for cloning a transaction and controlling the current transaction context.
trans-unit.target: 它还提供有关克隆事务和控制的当前事务上下文的功能。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the current transaction, if one is set, using the static <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.Current%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取当前事务中，如果已设置，使用静态<xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.Current%2A>属性。</xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a clone of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 创建事务的克隆。

trans-unit.source: Clones are created to pass transactions.
trans-unit.target: 创建克隆以传递的事务。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might not want to pass a <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction> to other applications, because you do not want others to commit your transaction.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可能不想要将传递<xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction>对其他应用程序，因为您不希望其他人提交您的事务。</xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction>

trans-unit.source: If you try to marshal or serialize a transaction, a clone is created for you automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试封送或序列化事务，克隆为你自动创建。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"></xref> that is a copy of the current transaction object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"> </xref> ，它是当前的事务对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient transaction.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置环境事务。

trans-unit.source: For more information on ambient transactions, please see the "Managing transaction flow using TransactionScopeOption" section of the [Implementing an Implicit Transaction using Transaction Scope](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关环境事务的详细信息，请参阅的"管理使用 TransactionScopeOption 的事务流"部分[实现使用事务范围的隐式事务](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)主题。

trans-unit.source: Although you can set the ambient transaction using this property, you should use the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope> object to manipulate the ambient transaction whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: 尽管你可以设置使用此属性的环境事务，应使用<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope>对象操作环境事务尽可能。</xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope>

trans-unit.source: This property is thread static.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是静态的线程。

trans-unit.source: If you change the ambient transaction using this property inside a <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope> an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown when <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope.Dispose%2A> is called, and the previous ambient transaction value is restored.
trans-unit.target: 如果你更改使用此属性内的环境事务<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope><xref:System.InvalidOperationException>时，将引发<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope.Dispose%2A>调用时，也可以还原以前的环境事务值。</xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"></xref> that describes the current transaction.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"> </xref>说明当前事务。

trans-unit.source: Creates a dependent clone of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 创建事务的依赖克隆。

trans-unit.source: A dependent transaction is a transaction whose outcome depends on the outcome of the transaction from which it was cloned.
trans-unit.target: 依赖的事务是其结果取决于从中克隆了事务的结果的事务。

trans-unit.source: The `cloneoption` parameter controls what kind of dependent transaction to create.
trans-unit.target: `cloneoption`参数控制要创建的依赖事务哪种类型。

trans-unit.source: If a dependent transaction is created with <xref:System.Transactions.DependentCloneOption>, it blocks the commit process of the transaction until the transaction times out, or <xref:System.Transactions.DependentTransaction.Complete%2A> is called on the <xref:System.Transactions.DependentTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用<xref:System.Transactions.DependentCloneOption>、 阻止，直到事务超时的事务或<xref:System.Transactions.DependentTransaction.Complete%2A><xref:System.Transactions.DependentTransaction>.</xref:System.Transactions.DependentTransaction>上调用</xref:System.Transactions.DependentTransaction.Complete%2A>的提交过程</xref:System.Transactions.DependentCloneOption>会创建一个依赖的事务

trans-unit.source: If it is created with <xref:System.Transactions.DependentCloneOption>, it automatically aborts the transaction if <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.Commit%2A> is called before <xref:System.Transactions.DependentTransaction.Complete%2A> is called on the <xref:System.Transactions.DependentTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用创建<xref:System.Transactions.DependentCloneOption>，它会自动中止事务如果<xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.Commit%2A><xref:System.Transactions.DependentTransaction.Complete%2A><xref:System.Transactions.DependentTransaction>。</xref:System.Transactions.DependentTransaction>调用</xref:System.Transactions.DependentTransaction.Complete%2A>之前调用</xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.Commit%2A></xref:System.Transactions.DependentCloneOption>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Transactions.DependentCloneOption"></xref> that controls what kind of dependent transaction to create.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Transactions.DependentCloneOption"> </xref>控制依赖的事务，若要创建哪种类型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Transactions.DependentTransaction"></xref> that represents the dependent clone.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Transactions.DependentTransaction"> </xref>表示依赖克隆。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources that are held by the object.
trans-unit.target: 释放由对象拥有的资源。

trans-unit.source: If you change the ambient transaction by setting <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.Current%2A> inside a <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope> an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown when <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope.Dispose%2A> is called, and the previous ambient transaction value is restored.
trans-unit.target: 如果你通过设置更改的环境事务<xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.Current%2A>内<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope><xref:System.InvalidOperationException>时，将引发<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope.Dispose%2A>调用时，也可以还原以前的环境事务值。</xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope> </xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Enlists a durable resource manager that supports two phase commit to participate in a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 登记在事务中支持两阶段提交参与持久资源管理器。

trans-unit.source: Resource managers with a durable enlistment must be able to perform recovery if they experience a failure.
trans-unit.target: 与持久登记的资源管理器必须能够执行恢复，如果在遇到失败。

trans-unit.source: For more information on recovery, see [Performing Recovery](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691).
trans-unit.target: 有关恢复的详细信息，请参阅[执行恢复](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691)。

trans-unit.source: For more information on volatile and durable resources, as well as how to enlist a resource, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e).
trans-unit.target: 易失性和持久的资源，以及如何登记资源的详细信息，请参阅[实现资源管理器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how a resource manager responds to commit notification and prepare the commit in two-phase commit, see [Committing A Transaction In Single-Phase and Multi-Phase](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d).
trans-unit.target: 有关资源管理器提交通知并准备在两阶段提交的提交的响应方式的详细信息，请参阅[中 Single-Phase 提交事务和多个阶段](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d)。

trans-unit.source: Resource managers enlisted for participation in a transaction through this method receive two phase commit notifications that correspond to the methods defined on the <xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification> interface.
trans-unit.target: 通过此方法参与在事务中登记的资源管理器接收对应于上定义的方法的两阶段提交通知<xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification>接口。</xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification>

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for a resource manager, which should persist across resource manager failure or reboot.
trans-unit.target: 资源管理器，它应保留在资源管理器发生故障或重新启动一个唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref href="System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification"></xref> interface to receive two phase commit notifications.
trans-unit.target: 实现的对象<xref href="System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification"></xref>接口接收两阶段提交通知。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Transactions.EnlistmentOptions"></xref> if the resource manager wants to perform additional work during the prepare phase.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Transactions.EnlistmentOptions"></xref>如果资源管理器想要执行的准备阶段的其他工作。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Transactions.Enlistment"></xref> object that describes the enlistment.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Transactions.Enlistment"> </xref>描述登记的对象。

trans-unit.source: Enlists a durable resource manager that supports single phase commit optimization to participate in a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 登记在事务中支持单阶段提交优化，以参与持久性资源管理器。

trans-unit.source: Resource managers with a durable enlistment must be able to perform recovery if they experience a failure.
trans-unit.target: 与持久登记的资源管理器必须能够执行恢复，如果在遇到失败。

trans-unit.source: For more information on recovery, see [Performing Recovery](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691).
trans-unit.target: 有关恢复的详细信息，请参阅[执行恢复](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691)。

trans-unit.source: For more information on volatile and durable resources, as well as how to enlist a resource, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e).
trans-unit.target: 易失性和持久的资源，以及如何登记资源的详细信息，请参阅[实现资源管理器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)。

trans-unit.source: You should note that even when your resource manager implementation enlists with this method, it is not guaranteed that it receives a single phase commit.
trans-unit.target: 你应注意，即使资源管理器实现登记使用此方法，也不能保证它将接收的单阶段提交。

trans-unit.source: The transaction manager can still send two phase commit notifications instead.
trans-unit.target: 事务管理器仍可以改为发送两阶段提交通知。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the single phase commit optimization, see [Optimization Using Single Phase Commit and Promotable Single Phase Notification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/653d51d1-b4bf-4e34-9a6f-aec073f0f5bb).
trans-unit.target: 有关单阶段提交优化的详细信息，请参阅[优化使用单个阶段提交和可提升的单阶段通知](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/653d51d1-b4bf-4e34-9a6f-aec073f0f5bb)。

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for a resource manager, which should persist across resource manager failure or reboot.
trans-unit.target: 资源管理器，它应保留在资源管理器发生故障或重新启动一个唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref href="System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification"></xref> interface that must be able to receive single phase commit and two phase commit notifications.
trans-unit.target: 实现的对象<xref href="System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification"></xref>必须能够接收的单阶段提交和两阶段提交通知的接口。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Transactions.EnlistmentOptions"></xref> if the resource manager wants to perform additional work during the prepare phase.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Transactions.EnlistmentOptions"></xref>如果资源管理器想要执行的准备阶段的其他工作。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Transactions.Enlistment"></xref> object that describes the enlistment.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Transactions.Enlistment"> </xref>描述登记的对象。

trans-unit.source: Enlists a resource manager that has an internal transaction using a promotable single phase enlistment (PSPE).
trans-unit.target: 登记该资源管理器具有使用可提升的单阶段登记 (PSPE) 的内部事务。

trans-unit.source: Enlistments in a transaction are volatile; that is, they do not survive the failure of the participant.
trans-unit.target: 在事务中的登记是易失性;也就是说，它们不会保留参与者的失败。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this method only suggests the transaction manager to escalate control, but the escalation itself is not guaranteed.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此方法仅建议事务管理器，提升控件，但不是保证升级本身。

trans-unit.source: If escalation fails, the user is not notified and the transaction is rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 如果升级失败，则不通知用户，并回滚事务。

trans-unit.source: The parameter `promotableSinglePhaseNotification` is used to communicate to the transaction manager the outcome of attempting to commit the resource manager's internal transaction.
trans-unit.target: 参数`promotableSinglePhaseNotification`用于传达给事务管理器尝试提交资源管理器的内部事务的结果。

trans-unit.source: If inconsistent data is reported, the transaction manager throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果报告数据不一致，事务管理器将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionStatus> outcome is reported, the transaction manager looks for the outcome notification in its own internal enlistment and ignores the reported response.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionStatus>报告结果、 事务管理器查找结果中的通知其自身内部的登记，并忽略报告的响应。</xref:System.Transactions.TransactionStatus>

trans-unit.source: For more information on enlistments and escalation of a transaction, please see [Transaction Management Escalation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5b87ae58-8ccf-4b9b-9715-41e4aade89b7).
trans-unit.target: 有关登记和升级的事务的详细信息，请参阅[事务管理升级](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5b87ae58-8ccf-4b9b-9715-41e4aade89b7)。

trans-unit.source: For more information on PSPE, see [Optimization Using Single Phase Commit and Promotable Single Phase Notification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/653d51d1-b4bf-4e34-9a6f-aec073f0f5bb).
trans-unit.target: PSPE 的详细信息，请参阅[优化使用单阶段提交和可提升单个阶段通知](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/653d51d1-b4bf-4e34-9a6f-aec073f0f5bb)。

trans-unit.source: **Note** This method uses <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; however, only the immediate caller is required to possess the `FullTrust` permission set.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**此方法使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>，防止它不受信任的代码中调用; 但是，仅限直接调用方需要拥有`FullTrust`权限集。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification"></xref> interface implemented by the participant.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification"> </xref>由参与者实现的接口。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Transactions.SinglePhaseEnlistment"></xref> interface implementation that describes the enlistment.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Transactions.SinglePhaseEnlistment"> </xref>接口描述登记的实现。

trans-unit.source: Enlists a resource manager that has an internal transaction using a promotable single phase enlistment (PSPE).
trans-unit.target: 登记该资源管理器具有使用可提升的单阶段登记 (PSPE) 的内部事务。

trans-unit.source: If the value specified for the `promoterType` parameter is `TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`, the transaction **must** be promoted by MSDTC and the `byte[]` returned from the `IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote` method **must** be an MSDTC transaction propagation token.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的值`promoterType`参数是`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`，事务**必须**msdtc 提升和`byte[]`从返回`IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote`方法**必须**是 MSDTC 事务传播标记。

trans-unit.source: If the value specified for the `promoterType` parameter is **not**`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDTC`, the transaction will not be promoted by MSDTC, but rather by the caller’s implementation of `IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification`.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的值`promoterType`参数是**不**`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDTC`，msdtc，而是由调用方的实现，事务将不会提升`IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification`。

trans-unit.source: If this call is successful, there is a set of subsequent operations on the transaction that will return a `TransactionPromotionException`.
trans-unit.target: 如果此调用是成功，则将返回对事务的后续操作的一组`TransactionPromotionException`。

trans-unit.source: These operations are: - `Transaction.EnlistDurable` - `TransactionInterop.GetDtcTransaction` - `TransactionInterop.GetExportCookie` - `TransctionInterop.GetTransmitterPropagationToken` - Serialization of a Transaction object
trans-unit.target: 这些操作是:- `Transaction.EnlistDurable` - `TransactionInterop.GetDtcTransaction` - `TransactionInterop.GetExportCookie` - `TransctionInterop.GetTransmitterPropagationToken` -的事务对象的序列化

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification"></xref> interface implemented by the participant.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification"> </xref>由参与者实现的接口。

trans-unit.source: The type of the distributed transaction processor.
trans-unit.target: 分布式的事务处理器的类型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Transactions.SinglePhaseEnlistment"></xref> interface implementation that describes the enlistment.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Transactions.SinglePhaseEnlistment"> </xref>接口描述登记的实现。

trans-unit.source: Enlists a volatile resource manager that supports two phase commit to participate in a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 登记在事务中支持两阶段提交参与易失性资源管理器。

trans-unit.source: Volatile resource managers cannot recovery from failure to complete a transaction in which they were participating.
trans-unit.target: 易失性资源管理器无法从完成它们已参与一个事务的故障中恢复。

trans-unit.source: To obtain a durable enlistment in a transaction, use the <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.EnlistDurable%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的持久登记在事务中，使用<xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.EnlistDurable%2A>方法。</xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.EnlistDurable%2A>

trans-unit.source: Resource managers enlisted for participation in a transaction through this method receive two phase commit notifications that correspond to the methods defined on the <xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification> interface.
trans-unit.target: 通过此方法参与在事务中登记的资源管理器接收对应于上定义的方法的两阶段提交通知<xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification>接口。</xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification>

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref href="System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification"></xref> interface to receive two-phase commit notifications.
trans-unit.target: 实现的对象<xref href="System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification"></xref>接口来接收两阶段提交通知。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Transactions.EnlistmentOptions"></xref> if the resource manager wants to perform additional work during the prepare phase.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Transactions.EnlistmentOptions"></xref>如果资源管理器想要执行的准备阶段的其他工作。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Transactions.Enlistment"></xref> object that describes the enlistment.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Transactions.Enlistment"> </xref>描述登记的对象。

trans-unit.source: Enlists a volatile resource manager that supports single phase commit optimization to participate in a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 登记在事务中支持单阶段提交优化，以参与易失性资源管理器。

trans-unit.source: Volatile resource managers cannot recovery from failure to complete a transaction in which they were participating.
trans-unit.target: 易失性资源管理器无法从完成它们已参与一个事务的故障中恢复。

trans-unit.source: To obtain a durable enlistment in a transaction, use the <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.EnlistDurable%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的持久登记在事务中，使用<xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.EnlistDurable%2A>方法。</xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.EnlistDurable%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on volatile and durable resources, as well as how to enlist a resource, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e).
trans-unit.target: 易失性和持久的资源，以及如何登记资源的详细信息，请参阅[实现资源管理器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how a resource manager responds to commit notification and prepare the commit, see [Committing A Transaction In Single-Phase and Multi-Phase](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d).
trans-unit.target: 有关资源管理器以提交通知并准备提交的响应方式的详细信息，请参阅[中 Single-Phase 提交事务和多个阶段](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d)。

trans-unit.source: You should note that even when your resource manager implementation enlists with this method, it is not guaranteed that it receives a single phase commit.
trans-unit.target: 你应注意，即使资源管理器实现登记使用此方法，也不能保证它将接收的单阶段提交。

trans-unit.source: The transaction manager can still send two phase commit notifications instead.
trans-unit.target: 事务管理器仍可以改为发送两阶段提交通知。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the single phase commit optimization, see [Optimization Using Single Phase Commit and Promotable Single Phase Notification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/653d51d1-b4bf-4e34-9a6f-aec073f0f5bb).
trans-unit.target: 有关单阶段提交优化的详细信息，请参阅[优化使用单个阶段提交和可提升的单阶段通知](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/653d51d1-b4bf-4e34-9a6f-aec073f0f5bb)。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref href="System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification"></xref> interface that must be able to receive single phase commit and two phase commit notifications.
trans-unit.target: 实现的对象<xref href="System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification"></xref>必须能够接收的单阶段提交和两阶段提交通知的接口。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Transactions.EnlistmentOptions"></xref> if the resource manager wants to perform additional work during the prepare phase.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Transactions.EnlistmentOptions"></xref>如果资源管理器想要执行的准备阶段的其他工作。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Transactions.Enlistment"></xref> object that describes the enlistment.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Transactions.Enlistment"> </xref>描述登记的对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this transaction and the specified object are equal.
trans-unit.target: 确定此事务和指定的对象是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 要与此实例进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: if obj and this transaction are identical; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 obj 与此事务完全相同; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位有符号的整数哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets the `byte[]` returned by the `Promote` method when the transaction is promoted.
trans-unit.target: 获取`byte[]`返回`Promote`方法提升事务时。

trans-unit.source: This method has the side effect of causing promotion of the transaction if it is not already promoted.
trans-unit.target: 此方法具有副作用，即如果未提升导致了事务提升。

trans-unit.source: The format of the returned `byte[]` is defined by the value of the `Transation.PromoterType` property.
trans-unit.target: 返回格式`byte[]`的值定义为`Transation.PromoterType`属性。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `Transaction.PromoterType` property is `TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc` or `Guid.Empty`, then the `byte[]` returned by this method is an MSDTC transmitter propagation token.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`Transaction.PromoterType`属性是`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`或`Guid.Empty`，则`byte[]`此方法返回的是 MSDTC 传输程序传播标记。

trans-unit.source: Any other value for the `Transaction.PromoterType` property specifies a format that is defined by the caller of `Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase` that specified the property type value.
trans-unit.target: 任何其他值`Transaction.PromoterType`属性指定的调用方定义的格式`Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`指定属性类型值。

trans-unit.source: In order to interpret the promoted token in this latter case, you will need to consult the documentation for the code that made the `EnlistPromotableSinglePhase` call.
trans-unit.target: 若要解释与提升令牌在此后一种情况下，你将需要查看文档所做的代码，以`EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`调用。

trans-unit.source: The `byte[]` returned by the `Promote` method when the transaction is promoted.
trans-unit.target: `byte[]`返回`Promote`方法提升事务时。

trans-unit.source: Gets the isolation level of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 获取事务的隔离级别。

trans-unit.source: The isolation level of a transaction determines what level of access other transactions have to volatile data before a transaction completes.
trans-unit.target: 事务的隔离级别确定的其他事务可以之前事务的易失性数据的访问级别完成。

trans-unit.source: For more information about isolation levels, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关隔离级别的详细信息，请参阅的文档<xref:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel>枚举。</xref:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref> values that indicates the isolation level of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref>值，该值指示事务的隔离级别。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two specified <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"></xref> instances are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 测试两个指定<xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"></xref>实例是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"></xref> instance that is to the left of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"> </xref>相等运算符左侧的实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"></xref> instance that is to the right of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"> </xref>相等运算符右侧的实例。

trans-unit.source: if x and y are equal; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if x and y are equal; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether two <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"></xref> instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示两个<xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"></xref>实例是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"></xref> instance that is to the left of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"> </xref>不等运算符左侧的实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"></xref> instance that is to the right of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"> </xref>不等运算符右侧的实例。

trans-unit.source: if x and y are not equal; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if x and y are not equal; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and later versions] Promotes and enlists a durable resource manager that supports two phase commit to participate in a transaction.
trans-unit.target: [在.NET Framework 4.5.2 及更高版本中受支持] 提升和登记在事务中支持两阶段提交参与持久的资源管理器。

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for a resource manager, which should persist across resource manager failure or reboot.
trans-unit.target: 资源管理器，它应保留在资源管理器发生故障或重新启动一个唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: An object that acts as a commit delegate for a non-distributed transaction internal to a resource manager.
trans-unit.target: 一个充当非分布式事务资源管理器的内部提交委托的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref href="System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification"></xref> interface to receive two phase commit notifications.
trans-unit.target: 实现的对象<xref href="System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification"></xref>接口接收两阶段提交通知。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Transactions.EnlistmentOptions"></xref> if the resource manager wants to perform additional work during the prepare phase.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Transactions.EnlistmentOptions"></xref>如果资源管理器想要执行的准备阶段的其他工作。

trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and later versions] Promotes and enlists a durable resource manager that supports two phase commit to participate in a transaction.
trans-unit.target: [在.NET Framework 4.5.2 及更高版本中受支持] 提升和登记在事务中支持两阶段提交参与持久的资源管理器。

trans-unit.source: Uniquely identifies the format of the `byte[]` returned by the Promote method when the transaction is promoted.
trans-unit.target: 格式进行唯一标识`byte[]`提升事务时由 Promote 方法返回。

trans-unit.source: If the transaction has not yet been promoted and does not yet have a promotable single phase enlistment, the value of this property will be `Guid.Empty`.
trans-unit.target: 如果事务尚未升级，并且尚不具有可提升的单阶段登记，此属性的值将`Guid.Empty`。

trans-unit.source: If the transaction has been or will be promoted to MSDTC, then the value of this property will be `TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`.
trans-unit.target: 如果事务已被或将提升为 MSDTC，则此属性的值将`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`。

trans-unit.source: If the transaction has been or will be promoted by a non-MSDTC promoter, the value of this property will be the value specified to an earlier call to `Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`.
trans-unit.target: 如果事务已被，或将由非 MSDTC 提升程序提升，此属性的值将为以前调用指定的值`Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`。

trans-unit.source: A guid that uniquely identifies the format of the `byte[]` returned by the Promote method when the transaction is promoted.
trans-unit.target: 格式进行唯一标识的 guid`byte[]`提升事务时由 Promote 方法返回。

trans-unit.source: Rolls back (aborts) the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 回滚 （中止） 事务。

trans-unit.source: Any copy of a transaction object can initiate the rollback of the transaction by calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 事务对象的任何副本可以通过调用此方法启动事务的回滚。

trans-unit.source: Only the original transaction object, which is a <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction> object, can be used to initiate an attempt to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 仅原始事务对象，它是<xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction>对象，可以用来启动尝试提交事务。</xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction>

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown when this method is called after the outcome of the transaction has already been determined.
trans-unit.target: 已确定事务的结果后调用此方法时，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Rolls back (aborts) the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 回滚 （中止） 事务。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of why a rollback occurred.
trans-unit.target: 回滚的发生原因的说明。

trans-unit.source: Sets the distributed transaction identifier generated by the non-MSDTC promoter.
trans-unit.target: 设置由非 MSDTC 提升程序生成的分布式的事务标识符。

trans-unit.source: This method can only be called successfully while the `IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote` method is being processed.
trans-unit.target: 仅成功调用此方法时`IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote`正在处理方法。

trans-unit.source: If this method is called at any other time, a `TransactionException` is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在其他任何时间，调用此方法`TransactionException`引发。

trans-unit.source: The specified value of the `promotableNotification` parameter must be the same object that was originally specified to the `Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase` invocation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值`promotableNotification`参数必须是到最初指定的相同对象`Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`调用。

trans-unit.source: If this is not the case, then an `InvalidOperationException` is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果这不是这种情况，则`InvalidOperationException`引发。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification"></xref> interface implemented by the participant.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification"> </xref>由参与者实现的接口。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the transaction used by the distributed transaction manager.
trans-unit.target: 使用分布式的事务管理器的事务标识符。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data required to serialize this transaction.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>序列化此事务所需的数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>要填充数据。

trans-unit.source: The destination (see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> ) for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: 目标 (请参阅<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>) 此序列化。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the transaction is completed.
trans-unit.target: 指示事务完成。

trans-unit.source: You can register for this event instead of using a volatile enlistment to get outcome information for transactions.
trans-unit.target: 你可以注册此事件而不是使用可变参与者获取事务的结果信息。

trans-unit.source: The parameter passed to the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionCompletedEventHandler> delegate is a <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction> instance.
trans-unit.target: 参数传递给<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionCompletedEventHandler>委托是<xref:System.Transactions.Transaction>实例。</xref:System.Transactions.Transaction> </xref:System.Transactions.TransactionCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: You can then query the <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.TransactionInformation%2A> property of the specific instance to get an instance of <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInformation>, whose <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInformation.Status%2A> property contains the status of a transaction with either the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionStatus> or <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionStatus> value.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以查询<xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.TransactionInformation%2A>要获取其实例的特定实例的属性<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInformation>、 其<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInformation.Status%2A>属性包含使用事务的状态<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionStatus>或<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionStatus>值。</xref:System.Transactions.TransactionStatus> </xref:System.Transactions.TransactionStatus> </xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInformation.Status%2A> </xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInformation> </xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.TransactionInformation%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Caution** Signing up for this event negatively affects the performance of the transaction it is attached to.
trans-unit.target: **警告︰**对注册此事件造成负面影响的事务将其附加到的性能。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to subscribe this event on a transaction that has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 尝试订阅此事件对已释放的事务。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves additional information about a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 检索有关事务的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionInformation"></xref> that contains additional information about the transaction.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionInformation"> </xref> ，包含有关事务的其他信息。
